grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 尚古【ショウコ】respect for olden days
尚古主義【ショウコシュギ】classicism, primitivism
好尚【コウショウ】taste, fancy, fashion
kun reading compounds: 尚【なお】still, yet, more, still more, greater, further, as ..., like ..., furthermore, in addition, moreover, note that ...
尚更【なおさら】still more, even more, all the more, still less, even less
今なお【いまなお】still, even now
